name: Eggy Hiking
description:
CONTROLS

Press Left and Right Mouse Buttons to Move.
Press and Hold Spacebar or the F key to Charge a Pogo Jump.
Press R to Reset Your Character.
Press Backspace to Pause.

A game created in a week for the July Game Jam on Newgrounds with the theme Egg!

There are some issues we couldn't iron out before release, like physics calculating differently depending on the refresh rate of your monitor. We hope you have fun with the game anyways.

My partner in crime for this project was Scrumdrew! He did the level design and music for this game. Check him out on twitter. https://twitter.com/Scrumdrew
